name: tram production | tram | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3608/documentation

Based on "tram production, RER 1991". Material consumption values refer to the production of one average tram (1 railcar and 0.55 trailer). Disposal of tram is included. Energy consumption is estimated from the energy content of the materials (50% energy of materials; allocation: 1/3 electricity and 2/3 light fuel oil). Total  kilometric performance: 27'333 vkm and a average load of 28 passengers.

The activity starts with the material (steel, aluminium, copper, polyethylene, rubber, glass and paint) for the production of the tram.

The inventory includes processes of material and energy consumption in vehicle manufacturing. Rail and road transport of materials is accounted for. Disposal of tram is included.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/302:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock/3020:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Extrapolated from "tram production, RER 1991". Vehicle manufacturing data are taken from one production site in  Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Material composition represents a tram produced in the early 90ties.;References:;Maibach M., Peter D. and Seiler B. (1999) Ökoinventar Transporte: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Transportsystemen und den Einbezug von Transportsystemen in Ökobilanzen. Technischer Schlussbericht. In: Schweizerischer Nationalfonds zur Förderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (ed. SPP Umwelt M.). 2nd Edition. INFRAS, Zürich
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data from one production site in Switzerland is used as an first estimate for Europe This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
